attributes.action: Do not allow Donald Trump to visit the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Donald Trump has banned entry to muslims only from countries in whichhe has no business interests and not from those who have presented a recent threat to the United States. His reasons for his discriminatory approach are false and unconstitutional and should not be condoned by the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should not be welcomed to Britain at all while he abuses our shared values with his shameful Muslim ban and attacks on refugee's and women's rights.
